electroMechanicalLogic.Interfaces

Interface IRelay

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISimulatedCircuit
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Buffer, Inverter

    public interface IRelay
extends ISimulatedCircuit
    A simulated electromechanical relay based on a model of the telegraph relay.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getOutput()
      Retrieves a value indicating whether power is flowing from the relay's output terminal or not.
      void setInput(boolean value)
      Sets a value indicating whether power is flowing into the relay's input terminal.

      • Methods inherited from interface electroMechanicalLogic.Interfaces.ISimulatedCircuit

        setPower, step

    • Method Detail

      • getOutput

        boolean getOutput()
        Retrieves a value indicating whether power is flowing from the relay's output terminal or not.
        Returns:
        true indicates that power is flowing from the relay's output terminal; false indicates that it is not.

      • setInput

        void setInput(boolean value)
        Sets a value indicating whether power is flowing into the relay's input terminal.
        Parameters:
        value - true to indicate that power is flowing into the relay's input terminal; false to indicate that it is not.
